meta.expr:content: data:blog.pageName + ", keyword 1, keyword 2, keyword 3, keyword 4, keyword 5"
meta.name: keywords

head.b:skin: /* Traduzido Por: http://maistemplate.blogspot.com.br Traduzido Por: http://maistemplate.blogspot.com.br Template Name: Montric Author: Templateify Author URI: http://www.templateify.com/ Date: 3 September 2013 Version: Free Version */ body#layout ul{list-style-type:none;list-style:none}body#layout ul li{list-style-type:none;list-style:none}body#layout #footer1 {float: left; width: 222px;}body#layout #footer2 {float: left; width: 222px;}body#layout #footer3 {float: left; width: 222px;}body#layout #footer4 {float: left; width: 222px;}body#layout .static_banner_wrapper {display:none;}body#layout .logo {width:100%; margin-top: -4px !important;height: 105px;}body#layout header {margin-bottom: -60px !important;}body#layout #search-8 {display:none;}.comments .comment .comment-actions a:hover {text-decoration:none !important;}body#layout .padding-top48 {padding-top: 0px !important; margin-left: 36px;}body#layout .sidebar_wrapper {width: 280px;float: right;}body#layout .real_content {width: 632px;float: left;}body#layout .content {margin: auto;width: 960px;}body#layout #lowerbar1 {width: 730px;margin: 0 auto;}.PopularPosts img {padding-right:0 !important;}.comments .continue a {display:none !important;}.content_wrapper {margin-top: 156px;} /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Wants to customize? this is free version it will not come with full stylesheet if you want to customize purchase the licensed version of montric from -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
